oxidation_state.description: The oxidation state of the interstitial defect site.

charge_states.description: Possible charge states for the interstitial defect.

fractional_coordinates.description: Fractional coordinates of the interstitial defect site within the lattice.

supercell_formula.description: Chemical formula of the supercell containing the interstitial defect.

defect_name.description: Name of the interstitial defect, indicating the element and type of defect.

defect_string_representation.description: String representation of the interstitial defect, including its position.

element_changes.description: Changes in the number of elements due to the interstitial defect.

latex_name.description: LaTeX formatted name of the interstitial defect.

defect_fpos_initial.description: Fractional coordinates of the defect site in the supercell structure.

defect_fpos_modified.description: Fractional coordinates of the defect site in the modified supercell structure.

user_defined_charge_states.description: User-defined charge states for the interstitial defect.
